name: Wizard (Diego Ochoa)
description:
You play as the wizard, the charismatic guy who is on a journey to retrieve a special treasure. On the way to the treasure, you will encounter enemies who don't like you very much. However, if you beat them into submission (less than 50% HP), you can convert them into your friends, allowing you to use them as attack or status cards in your own deck! Be careful of who you choose though because whoever is left behind will join the mysterious Big Bad's deck and fight against you once more! Good luck, and happy hunting!

Programmed by Diego Ochoa

Lead Artist Cameron Sigua

Supporting Artist Daniople
